title: General
fullText:
For every single-phase external supply, protection against transposition of the active and neutral conductors of the supply shall be by one of the following methods:
(a) transposition sensor; or
(b) onboard isolating transformer or electricity converter with a polarized output; or
(c) protective devices and switching devices in a connectable electrical installation shall operate in all live (active and neutral) conductors in accordance with Sections 3, 4 and 5.
See Sections 3 and 4 regarding switching of all live conductors.
